properties.name: scheme
properties.description: scheme used by Spring applications (http or https)

properties.name: issuer
properties.description: Value of th iss claim in OAuth2 tokens

properties.name: client-id
properties.description: Client ID used to get OAuth2 tokens

properties.name: client-secret
properties.description: Client secret used to get OAuth2 tokens

properties.name: user-name-attribute
properties.description: Claim to use as Authentication name

properties.name: gateway-uri
properties.description: scheme host and port of the gateway

properties.name: greetings-api-uri
properties.description: scheme host and port of the greeting-api Spring application

properties.name: ui-uri
properties.description: scheme host and port of the UI application
